name: Cron
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow at a specific time
natural_language_description: 这是 Cron 节点。主要用于: Triggers the workflow at a specific time

notice.displayName:
This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you publish it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'execute workflow'
notice.name: notice
